skill.name: knowledge
skill.description: Display knowledge base status and recent learnings
skill.summary: Display knowledge base status and recent learnings
skill.author: 0xrdan

security_audit.summary: This is a prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation. No executable code, scripts, network calls, or external commands are present. The skill reads project knowledge files to display status and statistics.

content.value_statement: Track project insights and learning mode status. The skill displays knowledge base statistics and recent learnings extracted during your development sessions, helping you understand project context and captured patterns.
actual_capabilities: Display learning mode status and session statistics
Count knowledge entries by category (patterns, quirks, decisions)
Extract and display recent learnings from project files
Show cache statistics and entry counts
Format knowledge base summary with visual indicators
limitations: Read-only operation - does not modify knowledge files
Requires knowledge files to exist in project structure
Cannot add new learnings - only displays existing content
Limited to knowledge files in predefined paths

use_cases.title: Track Project Patterns
use_cases.description: Monitor accumulated patterns, quirks, and decisions captured during development sessions.

use_cases.title: Review Knowledge Gaps
use_cases.description: Quickly see what project insights have been documented and identify missing context.

use_cases.title: Onboard with Context
use_cases.description: Access captured decisions and patterns to understand project conventions quickly.

prompt_templates.title: View Knowledge Status
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the current knowledge base status

prompt_templates.title: Recent Learnings
prompt_templates.prompt: What are the recent learnings in this project

prompt_templates.title: Full Knowledge Summary
prompt_templates.prompt: Give me a complete summary of the project knowledge base including learning mode status, statistics, and recent learnings

output_examples.input: Show me the current knowledge base status
output: üìä Knowledge Statistics - Patterns: 8 entries, Quirks: 3 entries, Decisions: 5 entries
üìù Recent Learnings - [Pattern] Async API calls, [Quirk] Non-standard token format, [Decision] Redis cache choice

best_practices: Run regularly to stay aware of accumulated project knowledge
Use with /learn command to add new insights after significant discoveries
Combine with /learn-on for continuous learning during development sessions
anti_patterns: Using this skill when knowledge files do not exist in the project
Expecting it to modify or create knowledge entries
Relying solely on displayed statistics without reading full knowledge files

faq.question: What tools support this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Use it in any supported environment.

faq.question: How many entries can it display?
faq.answer: The skill shows entry counts for all categories and displays the 5 most recent learnings.

faq.question: Does it integrate with other commands?
faq.answer: Yes. Use /learn to extract insights, /learn-on to enable, and /learn-off to disable learning mode.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a read-only skill that only displays existing knowledge files. No data is sent anywhere.

faq.question: Why is my knowledge base empty?
faq.answer: Enable learning mode with /learn-on. The knowledge base grows as insights are captured during sessions.

faq.question: How is this different from project documentation?
faq.answer: Knowledge base captures dynamic insights from your work sessions, while documentation is static and manually maintained.
